document.masterDocTitle: A revision of the genus Drasteria of Central Asia and Kazakhstan with special attention to the adjacent areas (Lepidoptera: Erebidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A revision of the genus Drasteria of Central Asia and Kazakhstan with special attention to the adjacent areas (Lepidoptera: Erebidae)

subSubSection.paragraph: Habitat ( Figs. 299, 300, 302, 303 ). Deserts, semideserts, steppes. Elevation: 200–1000 m .

Distribution . South-West Russia ( Astrakhan and Volgograd Provinces), Kazakhstan , northern parts of Middle Asia (foothills of North and Inner Tian-Shan), deserts of Uzbekistan and Turkmenistan , North Iran , West Afghanistan , Mongolia , North-West China , South shore of Caspian Sea.

Material examined (in total: 425 specimens ).
